name: restaurant-picker-redeploy
postCreateCommand: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.terraform.d && mkdir -p /home/vscode/.terraform.d/plugin-cache && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y make jq unzip software-properties-common && curl -sSL https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | sudo tee /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/microsoft.asc > /dev/null && sudo apt-add-repository -y https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/22.04/prod && sudo apt-get install -y aztfexport && make --version && aztfexport --version
